name: PayPal Holdings, Inc.
summary: PayPal Holdings, Inc. is a leading American multinational financial technology company specializing in online payments and digital money transfers for individuals and businesses worldwide. Founded in 1998 and headquartered in San Jose, California, PayPal operates as a payment processor for online vendors, auction sites, and commercial users, offering secure alternatives to traditional payment methods. It is publicly traded on NASDAQ under the ticker PYPL and ranks among the largest online payment solutions providers globally.
